events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit and I'd like to request a refund or an exchange. Please advise on how to proceed.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting a refund or exchange.
Assigning this refund case to the customer service representative team for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund or exchange request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket has been used or if it still has tags on it? This information helps us process your refund faster.
The order number is 123456789. I tried the jacket on once but didn’t remove the tags, so it’s in perfect condition.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund for you. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response. I'll wait for the return label email and send the jacket back immediately.
We have received the jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund for the jacket. Please let us know if there's anything else we can assist you with.
As you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us, and have a great day!
